It was initially created to be able to easily backup or create a distributable copy of an Ubuntu or derivative installation. Inspiration for this tool came from the [[mklivecd]] script that Mandriva uses and the remasterme script that is in [[PCLinuxOS]]. <br> <br> It is very useful to create a customized Live CD version of Ubuntu, one just as to install ubuntu, install all the programs needed, including codecs, etc... install updates (recommended), and then install and run the script to create a Live CD with much more functionality than a original Ubuntu Live CD, the resulting iso can also the later installed in a USB pendrive <ref>http://www.pendrivelinux.com/2007/09/28/usb-ubuntu-710-gutsy-gibbon-install/</ref>.
